comment.author: 57295681@N00
comment._content: @ Wystan and others who give context to these photos - thanks very much for putting in the time to research it! It really brings the photos to life!

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: @mcsherryp -- Thanks for your comment. I think of this as a game: every week the LOC crew gives us history buffs and Flickr addicts a bunch of puzzles to solve -- a nice alternative to the N Y Times crossword! I see that you live in Edinburgh, a beautiful city where, on a visit in my youth, I once climbed to the top of the Scott monument. (My wife, who was born in Yorkshire, begrudges the hours I waste on Flickr, but my tower-climbing days are past, and a geezer needs something to do . . . .)
